programme.title: Blessing of Formosa S1 Ep310
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness S1 Ep217
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: Taste of Life S1 Ep279
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Just Eat S1 Ep66
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Smashing Frank
programme.desc: Four young thieves wearing bunny masks pull off the heists targeting the rich. Calling themselves "Frank," their mission is less about money and more about exposing corruption through graffiti and viral videos. However, when they collide with a powerful church involved in a money-laundering scheme, their mission spirals into a deadly game.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of brutal murders committed by a serial killer. Veteran detective Cham and rookie cop Will are assigned to the case. During the investigation, they encounter Wang Tao, who accidentally killed Cham's wife. Seeking redemption, Wang assists them in tracking down the killer, but her involvement puts her in grave danger.

programme.title: Battle of the Wolf
programme.desc: On his flight home, former special forces sergeant Zhang Zhi Yong and his wife find themselves caught in a terrorist conspiracy masterminded by international criminals. Drawing on his unwavering courage and tactical expertise, he protects his wife and fellow passengers while dismantling the deadly plot and ensuring everyone's safe return home.

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: The sequel to "Table for Six", Bernard and Lung plan to get married while their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for everyone involved.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva's mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother's wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva's heart?

programme.title: Trouble Girl
programme.desc: Xiao Xiao suffers from ADHD and faces bullying in school. Her mother sees her as a troublemaker, while her father toils abroad. The only solace comes from her empathetic teacher, Paul. During a typhoon, Xiao Xiao discovers a secret between her mother and Paul, unravelling complex emotions and shared helplessness in life.

programme.title: Hk Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team's performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan's help.

programme.title: Battle of the Wolf
programme.desc: On his flight home, former special forces sergeant Zhang Zhi Yong and his wife find themselves caught in a terrorist conspiracy masterminded by international criminals. Drawing on his unwavering courage and tactical expertise, he protects his wife and fellow passengers while dismantling the deadly plot and ensuring everyone's safe return home.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a bank's top executive's use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the bank's chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the team's downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: The Wig
programme.desc: Meng Zhong is a law graduate overwhelmed by despair after failing the bar exam three times and vents his frustration on a drunken passenger one stormy night. Twenty years later, Meng is a successful lawyer, but his investigation into a sexual assault case involving a young girl rekindles haunting memories he cannot escape.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: An Abandoned Team
programme.desc: Uncle Jia is bad-tempered and lives alone. His forced retirement, failed marriage and strained relationship with his daughter have left him in despair, prompting him to consider ending his life. Fortunately, he is rescued by a stray dog and an animal welfare volunteer, allowing him to rediscover his purpose in life.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Dust To Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kong's ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: My Wife is a Gambling Maestro
programme.desc: Natalie Yao Meng stars as the gambling queen, Ying Ying, who is a contender for the Asian God of Gamblers competition. But before the competition she is betrayed by her fianc and left for dead. Rescued by a young man called Gerrard, who suffering from amnesia, Ying Ying, must recover in time to compete in the big event!

programme.title: Wild City
programme.desc: A cop-turned-bar-owner befriends a drunken woman at closing hours and finds himself pursued by her former lover and the thugs he employs. The chase turns deadly when the bar owner's deadbeat brother and a suitcase full of cash enter the picture.

programme.title: Men Suddenly In Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan, actor Cheung Chau Wan, gynecologist Fu Mo Sum, feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung, and dance coach Charlie Lam - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu, who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor's plot once again.

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor's Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun, the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They fall into a misunderstanding on the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to get her to act as his fianc so as to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Journey of the Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: Lion VS Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she's soon framed for her husband's murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: Si Si, a spoiled and naive rich girl with only basic kung fu training, becomes enchanted by the legends of the fearless hero Qin Ge. Determined to escape her father's arranged marriage, she disguises herself as a man and sets out to find him, hoping to challenge Qin Geonly to be drawn into a deadly plot within the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport zombies for a living and are hired to move nine zombies in one go. When two hop away, it is revealed that one is actually a man in disguise trying to escape his enemies. It turns out that both the disguised zombie and Chan are martial arts experts!

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his bride use the deadly weapon - Phoenix Lute to fight against evil, but the lute accidentally falls into the hands of bandits hoping to use it to take control of the province. Gui Wu must now fight to recover the lute and beat the bandits.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his father's martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hung's passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lu's disciple.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Come Drink with Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar Drunken Cat who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kong's entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: House of Traps
programme.desc: An evil prince has hidden the stolen imperial treasures in a house filled with booby-trapped blades. Amid plasma-spurting attacks, heroes and rogues try to uncover the deadly secrets of the house...

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang's fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards' heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: The Story of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the men's help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Honey Bunny In Hollywood S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.title: Sheriff Country S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Sixth Man - When a daring daylight robbery shakes the heart of Edgewater, Sheriff Mickey Fox must navigate rising tensions, personal entanglements and a town quick to judge.

programme.title: Fire Country S4 Ep3
programme.desc: The Tiny Ways We Start to Heal - The Station 42 team responds to a dangerous zipline accident that escalates into a wildfire due to illegal fireworks. Meanwhile, Sharon struggles with letting go of Vince's belongings and unexpectedly finds comfort in Vince's ex, Renee.

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel Of Fortune S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Hosted by Pat Sajak and Vanna White, "Celebrity Wheel of Fortune" welcomes celebrities to solve word puzzles for a chance to win up to $1 million. All of the money won goes to a charity of their choice.

programme.title: BULLET TRAIN
programme.desc: In Bullet Train, Brad Pitt stars as Ladybug, an unlucky assassin determined to do his job peacefully after one too many gigs gone off the rails. Fate, however, may have other plans, as Ladybug's latest mission puts him on a collision course with lethal adversaries from around the globe - all with connected, yet conflicting, objectives - on the world's fastest train...and he's got to figure out how to get off. From the director of Deadpool 2, David Leitch, the end of the line is only the beginning in a wild, non-stop thrill ride through modern-day Japan.

programme.title: FANTASY ISLAND S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Peaches & The Jilted Bride - Jilted bride Laura arrives on the island still in her wedding dress, having just been stood up at the altar, Isla tells Ruby about the complicated past between her people and the Roarkes.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep3
programme.desc: History - A body found on the Boston wharf pulls Lena and Danny into a tense drug investigation alongside Lena's former partner, Detective Brian Rodgers (Ryan Broussard), sparking personal and professional friction. Jonah and Sean chase down a missing man tied to a scavenger hunt, while Sarah and Mae navigate emotional challenges at home and in court.

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Edge - When Dr. Donald Ducky Mallard (Adam Campbell), a liaison from D.C. headquarters and an old acquaintance of Gibbs, arrives to evaluate whether Pendleton needs an in-house medical examiner, not everyone trusts that's the real reason behind his visit.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sunny - When the hit and run victim from one of Tess' (Dolly Lewis) former cases awakes from a coma, Sunny (Agam Darshi) encourages Tess to track down new leads even though she's no longer on the force. Tess' ex-partner Jake Campbell (Daniel Gillies) inherits Tess' case files along with a new partner, Leo Li (Tony Giroux), who is quick to dismiss the case as a dead end. As Tess makes progress, she discovers the incident is connected to a notorious unsolved murder. Meanwhile, Tess' best friend Matt (Jarod Joseph) encourages Tess to open up about her vision loss to Jake. Sunny, desperate to help Tess find leads, reveals her surprising financial situation and a dilemma on her doorstep - the very doorstep of her apartment that she is terrified to cross.

programme.title: ROOKIE, THE S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Czech Mate - John Nolan, the oldest rookie in the LAPD, has used his life experience, determination and sense of humor to keep up with rookies 20 years his junior. Nearing the end of his training, Nolan now faces his biggest challenge as a police officer when he must come to terms with the choices he has made in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: DOC S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Her Heart - Amy's past comes back to haunt her when a desperate father sacrifices everything to secure his daughter's heart transplant.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep3
programme.desc: History - A body found on the Boston wharf pulls Lena and Danny into a tense drug investigation alongside Lena's former partner, Detective Brian Rodgers (Ryan Broussard), sparking personal and professional friction. programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS S2 Ep3

programme.title: HELLBOY
programme.desc: This supernatural action-adventure is based on Mike Mignola's acclaimed Dark Horse Comics series. Brought to Earth by evil genius Rasputin (Karel Roden) to aid the Nazis in their dying cause, Hellboy (Ron Perlman) was rescued by Professor Broom (John Hurt), founder of the clandestine B.P.R.D. (Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic mer-man (Doug Jones) and a pyro-kinetic (Selma Blair). Hidden from the society they are assigned to protect, they are the key line of defense against Rasputin, who seeks to reclaim Hellboy to the dark side and use his powers to bring about Armageddon.

programme.desc: Serve and Protect - NCIS is tasked to protect the daughter of a Russian oligarch carrying a deadly secret. Meanwhile, Sam asks Tennant for a favor.

programme.desc: Unforeseen - After multiple people are targeted and killed with a poisonous gas in broad daylight, the team races to find the killer, who they believe is tied to an eco-terrorist plot. Meanwhile, Maggie continues to explore motherhood.

programme.desc: Peace Talks - Hondo and Hicks desperately search for Powell, who's gone missing in Mexico City along with a thermobaric bomb capable of killing thousands. And while Deacon and Tan assist from L.A., Deacon's pride gets injured in a boxing match with Rocker.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep8
programme.desc: Wicked Games - Danny and Baez are on edge when Sam Evans (David R. Nash), a serial killer who once targeted Baez and her daughter, is released early from prison. Also, Jamie and Anthony team up on an investigation involving one of Anthony's criminal informants, his ex-wife's brother, Eddie clashes with Captain McNichols over a sergeant who keeps downgrading her cases, and Frank is upset when Abigail goes behind his back regarding a professional favor for her husband.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tess - Diagnosed with Leber's Neuropathy, homicide detective Tess Avery (Dolly Lewis) quits the police force after nearly getting her partner, Jake Campbell (Daniel Gillies), killed. Unwilling to accept help, or even admit her new reality, Tess turns to an assistive app to help navigate the world around her while still "passing" as sighted. Through the EyesUP app, Tess finds an unorthodox partner in Sunny Patel (Agam Darshi), an overly enthusiastic seeing eye guide working from her home in New York City who helps Tess investigate the brutal abduction of a young mother who may still be alive. But Sunny has a secret: she's an agoraphobe who only leaves her apartment through the eyes of her clients, and is hiding a violent event in her own past.

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED S6 Ep15
programme.desc: Four Bodies - A string of late-night murders with the same M.O. sends the Fugitive Task Force on a hunt for a serial killer with ties to a radical feminist group. Meanwhile, Nina's sister asks her for a big favor, causing a strain on Scola and Nina's relationship.

programme.desc: Courtney Cox - Courteney Cox joins Bear in Ireland, where they climb jagged peaks, descend sheer cliffs, battle the cold and feast on maggots.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Trees S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Discover how trees can extend their lives by 'walking' across the land and planting new roots, how they can 'learn' from trauma, and how a decaying tree has the miraculous ability to nurture new life.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Happiness - Griff Rhys Jones finishes his journey across Canada in the popular, lifestyle province of British Columbia in the Pacific Northwest and discovers what it is about this place that makes people so happy.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Shaquille O'Neal - Shaquille O'Neal joins Bear in the Adirondack Mountains of Upstate New York, where they deal with dense forest, leeches and steep cliffs.

programme.title: Wild Scandinavia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ice and Fire - Scandinavia's extremes have been shaped by ice and fire, but it's the sun that reigns here. Polar bears, musk oxen and arctic foxes must survive from the polar night to the midnight sun.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The presenter takes a train ride into tea country to find out about Ceylon tea. Xander also meets a master Kandyan dancer to learn about Kandy city's annual procession.

programme.title: Solar System S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice Worlds - Professor Brian Cox explores the solar system's ice giants, frozen moons and worlds where ice behaves in unimaginable ways.

programme.title: Wild Latin America S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Realm of the Spectacled Bear - Get to know South America's only bear species. Witness the shy and charismatic spectacled bear play, forage, and look for mates at the secluded Chaparri Ecological Reserve in Northern Peru.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wanderers of the Lost Forest - Hogsback, South Africa, is home to two fascinating primates: The Samango monkeys and the Cape Parrots. See how they overcome habit loss, travel across town for food, and make the most of a difficult situation.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Baboons of Bambelela - The Bambelela Troop is a successful and gregarious troop of Chacma Baboons that live in a pristine valley in the Waterberg Mountains of South Africa. But they have a problemthey're not the only baboons around.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Geladas of Ethiopia - The gelada is a rare monkey that lives in the Simien Mountains of Ethiopia. They're charismatic, vocal, and mix affection and confrontation. Watch as they face the challenges of their habitatand each other.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Baboon Lagoon - Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continent's most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Africa's Baboons - As humans take up more space, the baboons of Africa must adapt. Travel across the continent to watch them form unbreakable social bonds, serve to protect their families and survive a changing landscape.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Rivers - Trace dazzling waterways all over the world, from volcanic rivers in Russia's far east to geothermal streams in Florida. Watch as beavers transform entire landscapes with their well-engineered dams, then enjoy a winter spa day with manatees.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Lakes - Journey through mystical lakes, where life adapts, survives, and transforms. Witness the power of ancient beasts like the snapping turtle, watch a dragonfly metamorphosis, and walk tall with flamingoes as they brave burning, corrosive waters.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Swamps - Unmask the eerie beauty of swamplands, which have inspired centuries of folklore and serve as a vital link between life and death. Swim with hungry crocodiles, see deer gamble with their lives for food, and watch carnivorous plants snap up prey.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Frozen - Freeze time as water becomes a force of change in Earth's most frigid ecosystems. Hunt for unsuspecting seals with polar bears, bathe in natural hot springs with macaques, and try out a unique survival strategy with Arctic foxes.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family - Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion - Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Rivers - Trace dazzling waterways all over the world, from volcanic rivers in Russia's far east to geothermal streams in Florida. Watch as beavers transform entire landscapes with their well-engineered dams, then enjoy a winter spa day with manatees.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep2

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Southeast Asia - With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill - on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Chasing Scales - Storm into a new suburb, where the wranglers keep deadly snakes from slipping into family homes. Watch as Stu and Liv pull an eastern brown from a job site, Jess and Dan expel a python from a shed, and Mick and Adele evict a red belly from a bedroom.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Home Invasion - Respond to danger on a rural property with Mick and Adele, who brave a fired-up brown snake. Tread carefully as Jess and Dan extract a python from a play area, and get spooked when a chicken-hunting python squashes Liv's hand during a tense rescue.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fire's pivotal role in shaping Australia's natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020's brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent's wildlife.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix's search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tidelands - Head to America's far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bandit, Max, and George - Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Zanzibar's Poison Monkey - Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungleand find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Usa - The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Becoming Elephant: the Orphans of Reteti S1 Ep1
programme.desc: First Steps - Explore community-run Reteti Elephant Sanctuary, where human surrogate moms offer survival lessons and nurture young elephants through play. Bond with trunkless Long'uro and see why six-year-old Kelele's mysterious illness could delay his release.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Life Among Trees - How many trees can you find in the Amazon? And what's it like to live up in them? Travel through the canopy and see how more than 1200 species of trees coexist. Plus, follow monkeys and other creatures who call these trees home.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dry Season - The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to surviveand if they don't, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spud, Digger, and Tommy - Explore Tasmanian devils' softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Kimba's Rise - While the dominant males roam nearby territories, hunting duties fall to the Mwamba pride's nine strong lionesses. See how they cope with the approach of the rainy season and six growing teenagers with boundless appetites.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Growing Pains - Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary's orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla's fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.desc: First Steps - Explore community-run Reteti Elephant Sanctuary, where human surrogate moms offer survival lessons and nurture young elephants through play. Bond with trunkless Long'uro and see why six-year-old Kelele's mysterious illness could delay his release.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S8 Ep2
programme.desc: Series 8, Episode 2 - The teams make 24 identical Le Petit Antoine and 24 re-invented fruit tarts, and create serenity with a Japanese-garden-inspired showpiece adorned with flavourful roll cakes.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 10 - Jason goes artsy in Al Quoz cooking up incredible dishes and meets chef Keren Ye.

programme.title: George Clarke's Remarkable Renovations S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Pub and Butcher's Shop, Framlingham - Paul and Imogen snap up a pub and butcher's shop, with ambitious plans to restore the Grade II listed building and add a modern glass extension. But there are long delays and eye-watering costs.

programme.title: Grand Designs S23 Ep2
programme.desc: Series 23, Episode 2 - Sarah and Pip are smitten with a 150-year-old Bedfordshire barn that's keeling over. Can they retain its charm and spirit, while also transforming it into a sleek, modern home?

programme.title: Listing Mauritius S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In Episode 3, Mridula shows off a villa in Mont Choisy, Nawsheen is in the South-East area of Anahita, Grahame presents a huge villa in La Balise, Rinie tests Manon on her selling skills, and Samuel is back in the Black River area.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Amazing Hilltop Escapes - Explore a dazzling station hotel, hidden in the mountains of Spain. A futuristic Bubble hotel set deep within a forest. and an extraordinary escape perched on a cliff in Norway.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Taste of Shanghai S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Rick visits the Chinese city of Shanghai to search out the source of the Chinese dishes we all know so well.

programme.title: Jamie Cooks The Mediterranean S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Tunisia - Inspired by the sublime sights and smells of Tunisia's thrilling treats, Jamie cooks crispy prawn parcels drizzled with harissa and a flavour-packed chicken and merguez sausage stew.

programme.title: Grand Designs S23 Ep2
programme.desc: Series 23, Episode 2 - Sarah and Pip are smitten with a 150-year-old Bedfordshire barn that's keeling over. Can they retain its charm and spirit, while also transforming it into a sleek, modern home?

programme.desc: Series 8, Episode 4 - The teams create judge Benoit's 'Le Caf Crme' and a gardening-themed illusion showpiece with a hidden veg-inspired desserts. Whose patisserie prowess will blossom and who'll be bottom of the heap?

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Toby and Islay's Sonar Hull - Simon and his team visit Toby and his daughter Islay in Pembrokeshire, where Toby has already created some unusual spaces on his campsite, but needs help on his latest big idea of turning a sonar hull from a warship into a land-locked submarine.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep8
programme.desc: David, Sue and Katie's Treehouse - Simon and his team head to Taunton, in Somerset, on an enchanted journey to meet David, Sue and daughter Katie, a family obsessed with fairies and all things magical.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S33 Ep2
programme.desc: Graham Norton presents a lively chat show featuring Taylor Swift, Cillian Murphy, Greta Lee, Jodie Turner-Smith, Domhnall Gleeson and Lewis Capaldi.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 10 - Jason goes artsy in Al Quoz cooking up incredible dishes and meets chef Keren Ye.

programme.desc: More Will Than Skill - Jordan North has more will than skill when cooking, so he joins Mary for some simple recipes to impress his pals, and as a thank you takes her to the pub for a pint and game of darts.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hrs to Hell and Back S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Seafarer's - Chef Ramsay descends upon a Virginia based seafood restaurant situated right off a busy highway that isn't seeing much business these days. Seafarer's is run by two sisters, Amber and Autumn Halterman, who are always at war with each other.

programme.desc: Series 5, Episode 1 - The junior bakers enter the Bake Off tent for their exciting baking challenges on Cake Day.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee S9 Ep10
programme.desc: Series 9, Episode 10 - It's the final of The Great British Sewing Bee, and after challenges including a Victoriana dress, fabulous men's outfits and a two-in-one dress, only one sewer will be crowned winner.

programme.title: Mary Berry Makes It Easy S1 Ep2
programme.desc: More Will Than Skill - Jordan North has more will than skill when cooking, so he joins Mary for some simple recipes to impress his pals, and as a thank you takes her to the pub for a pint and game of darts.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Donal and Max are steering their way to the Ancient East, a land of myths and legends and food traditions but first up Donal takes to the sky to battle a great fear of heights at Carlingford Adventure Centre.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee S9 Ep10

programme.title: Listing Mauritius S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In Episode 3, Mridula shows off a villa in Mont Choisy, Nawsheen is in the South-East area of Anahita, Grahame presents a huge villa in La Balise, Rinie tests Manon on her selling skills, and Samuel is back in the Black River area.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 6 - Cornish king crab is on the menu for Rick as he heads out of Newquay to catch and cook this tasty crustacean. Afterwards, he takes a trip inland to Bodmin Moor to meet Robin Hanbury Tenison, one of the 20th century's last great explorers. His farm is home to one of Cornwall's most ambitious rewilding projects, where Robin's son, Merlin, has recently introduced a pair of wild beavers who are doing their best to restore biodiversity in this corner of Cornwall.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 3, Episode 4 - Stacey and her crack team help single mum Claire and her five boys transform their home.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Justine encounters parrots in Kuala Lumpur and orangutans in Semenggoh. Chef Wong serves a delicious Penang classic and then Justine makes popular local dishes like mee kolok and mouth-watering curry puffs.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In Mexico City, Paul samples the best taco he's ever had, discovers how to make Pan Dulce, attempts to eat a tarantula, goes on a takeaway food tour and has a go at fire hockey.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S4 Ep1
programme.desc: ION Adventure Hotel, Iceland - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit ION Adventure Hotel in Iceland, a design hotel levitating out from a dormant volcano. Guests visit here expecting the adventure of a lifetime, exploring lava flows and glaciers.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep9

programme.desc: Nigel and Maria's Caravan - In 2017, Nigel and Maria inherited a 400-year-old farm near Cullompton, in Devon, and want to give up their day jobs to spend as much time as they can on the farm with their family.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 7 - Rick boards the ferry in Penzance to take him to the Isles of Scilly, a group of islands which were once part of Cornwall. And in the world-famous gardens of Tresco, Rick meets a beekeeper attempting to breed a native Scillonian honeybee to deal with the harsh Atlantic climate. This inspires Rick to cook a honey pudding with Cornish ice cream and a butterscotch sauce.

programme.title: Jamie Cooks The Mediterranean S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spain - Jamie is in Spain in the Catalan region. Inspired by the deep taste from the signature Catalan Sofrito, Jamie watches on as his host cooks Scorpion fish soup.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hidden Retreats - Explore a beauty high in the cliffs of Norway. An unusual shipment of containers stacked in the outback of New South Wales. And a network of striking treehouses concealed in an English forest.

programme.title: Grand Designs S23 Ep3
programme.desc: Series 23, Episode 3 - Kathryn, who's lived on the same London street for 60 years, is building a mirror image of her Edwardian home, right next door, but with a 21st-century twist.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off S6 Ep6
programme.desc: Dessert Week - In Dessert Week, amateur bakers compete to create three delicious desserts: a family favourite, a beautiful layered Opera Cake with a twist, and a Showstopping fun-filled Ice Cream Cake Pop.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep37
programme.desc: How Can We Hide To Watch Butterflies? - JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders how can we hide to watch butterflies? That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep38
programme.desc: How Can I Go Faster Than Joey And Jinx? - It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. How can I go faster than Joey and Jinx? Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going 'Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works, he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep39
programme.desc: What Shall We Have For Our Harvest Breakfast? - It's Harvest time and Jess and his friends are having a special harvest breakfast. But all there is to eat is grass! Jess wonders, What shall we have for our harvest breakfast? That's the Big Question! Baa likes juicy things to eat. Jess remembers that he saw some juicy blackberries on his way to Buttercup Meadow. He and Baa go and pick some. They taste delicious, but it's still not quite perfect. Billie wants something crunchy. Jess remembers seeing some crunchy hazelnuts on the way to the blackberries. He and Billie go and collect some hazelnuts. Juicy and crunchy is fantastic, but it's still not perfect. What about something chewy suggests Willow. Jess remembers that he and Billie found some chewy oats on their way to the hazelnut tree. So he and Willow fetch some oats. It's tasty but it's still a bit dry - until Jess adds the final touch - some milk. Perfect! They've made delicious juicy-crunchy-chewy-mushy muesli! And what's more, Jess has answered his Big Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep40
programme.desc: What Hat Should Mimi Wear? - Jess and Mimi are decorating hats. Mimi can't decide which of her two hats to wear - the one decorated with flowers or the one decorated with berries? It's a Big Question to answer! Baa and Billie are having fun making shadow shapes on the barn door so they go and ask them for advice. Jess suggests that he and Baa model the hats for Mimi. They look great but Mimi still doesn't know what they'd look like on her. JESS remembers the shadows that Baa was making earlier and suggests that she could wear a hat and look at her shadow to see what it looks like. Mimi tries it but she still can't see herself properly. It's just an outline. Undeterred, Jess suggests that they go and ask Horace for help. At the pond they meet the puppies who tel them about their new puppy friends who live in the pond. Jess realises that the puppies are looking at themselves reflected in the water. He realises that MIMI too may be able to see herself in the water. And of course she can! HORACE arrives and tell them that he's alway

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep41
programme.desc: What's Happened To My Little Tree? - Jess shows us his little tree: a beautiful flowering shrub in full bloom. He tells us that his little tree didn't always look like this...there was a time when the tree's leaves turned yellow! What's happening to my little tree? That's the Big Question! Jess asks Mimi for help, but she's in bed with a bad cold. She's drinking lots of fluids to help make her better. Jess gives his little tree some more water to help make it better but when he goes to check on his tree the next day the leaves have turned brown and crinkly! Baa and Billie come along - Billie is tucked in the brim of Baa's woolly hat, it's too cold for her to come out. Jess wonders if his little tree is cold and needs warming up. So he wraps a potato sack round the little tree. But the next day things are even worse the leaves are falling off.! And it's happening all over Greendale Farm! Jess goes to see Horace who is busy composing a new song. It's all about the Seasons. Jess finally realises that what's happening to his tree is perfe

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep42
programme.desc: It's the day of Mimi's dance in Jess's barn but its too hot to move, let alone dance. Jess wonders how they can all keep cool! That's the BIG QUESTION. Jess asks his friends for ideas. Horace keeps cool by swimming under water, but that's no good for Jess and everyone else who can't swim. The puppies keep cool by panting, but that just makes Jess even hotter and out of breath. And Willow keeps cool by standing very still. That won't work for a dance, they can't all keep still! Mimi comes past holding a little fan which makes a lovely cool breeze. Jess realises that what they need is a giant fan that could make a cool breeze in the barn. He and Mimi make a huge fan which Horace works as part of his one-man band. Everyone has a great time dancing and keeping cool. Jess has answered the Question. Yippety Yay!

And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep43
programme.desc: What's The Funny Little Creature In The Pond? - Jess is looking after Horace's underwater friends in the pond whilst Horace is away. He sees a funny creature with a round head, a long tail and a little mark on his nose. What's the funny little creature in the pond? Hey! That's the Big Question! The creature has vanished so Jess describes it to Mimi who draws a picture of it. Mimi, Joey and Jinx think it must be a fish and name him Freddie, but Jess is not so sure. Time passes and Jess doesn't see Freddie again for ages. When he does spot him he's grown two back legs! Jess decides he needs a closer look using Billie's magnifying glass. They search for Freddie all round the pond. Baa thinks he's found him, but it turns out to be a newt, with four legs and spots on its back. At that moment a small frog jumps out onto a lily pad. It has the white mark on its nose just like Freddie but this is a frog! What's happened wonders Jess. Horace comes back and explains that frogs start out as tadpoles and gradually change, growing legs and losing their tail.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Horace has planned a big musical show but before it can start it begins raining and everyone runs for shelter. How can we keep dry? Asks JESS - that's the Big Question. Jess, Baa and Billie find shelter under some vine leaves. They're keeping dry but they're too far away from the pond to watch the show. Jess thinks that maybe they could wear a hat to keep dry - Baa's hat is soft and lets the water in though so that's no good but it gives Jess another idea. They can use the big basket in his barn as a giant hat to keep them all dry. It's made of wood and is hard. It's bound to keep them dry. But the woven basket lets the water in too. What are they going to do? Mimi walks by with her umbrella. She's lovely and dry. They all try to crowd under it but it's not big enough. We need to build a BIG umbrella says Jess. And they can use the vine leaves that kept them dry earlier. Perfect. The friends all build a huge umbrella that they can shelter under as they listen to Horace's fantastic music show. They've

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY S1 Ep6217
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japan where he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: YONEZAWA: "Beni," Japanese Red S1 Ep6053
programme.desc: Since ancient times, safflowers grown in Yonezawa have been used to dye fabric a deep red color associated with the sun. Experience its mysterious, vivid beauty through time-lapse footage.

programme.title: BIZ STREAM S1 Ep2074
programme.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan S1 Ep6126
programme.desc: Gojinjo Taiko is a wild, powerful performance by masked drummers. It originated 400 years ago, when villagers disguised themselves as oni (demons) to scare away a warlord's army.

programme.title: Short Program S1 Ep6064
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju S1 Ep6061
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker."

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights S1 Ep2061
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from ( ), Day ( ) of the Grand Sumo Tournament in ( ).

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar S1 Ep6124
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the winter dates of Shokan and Daikan. The nuns teach us how to make seasonal rice porridge with seven herbs, kan-koji fermented rice and dried vegetables.

programme.title: 1/2: People Who Don't Drink S1 Ep6065
programme.desc: 1 in 2 don't drink in Japan, where intense social drinking is normal. Through interviews of drinkers and non-drinkers we hear both sides, including a couple who went sober and opened a no-alcohol bar.

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook S1 Ep6050
programme.desc: Furofuki daikon with two sauces. Both sauces use a fresh white miso base, but one is made with chopped butterbur and the other with yuzu citrus. Serve with boiled daikon.

programme.title: Where We Call Home S1 Ep2087
programme.desc: We meet Ashraf Baburi in Chiba Prefecture who provides work to women in his native Afghanistan by importing traditional rugs they weave, and French-born Stephane Danton who runs a tea store in Tokyo.
